attributes.action: Remove the green sweets from Starburst and to reinstate the Opal Fruits brand name.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Re-branding "Opal Fruits" to "Starburst" is globalization at its most sinister.  The corporations are playing with our childhood memories here - It is just NOT ON.

Please Mr Blair, Act NOW!

Did anybody ever like the green ones?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
